 First of all - bugger off. You have absolutely no basis for this remark. I currently am backing Bill Richardson precisely because of his history and qualifications. He is currently govener of New Mexico after having spent 14 years in congress where he served on several committes and as the Cheif Deputy Whip. He also went on several diplomatic missions - in some he even negotiated the return of hostages and remains of Americans in hostile territory. He served as US Ambassador for the UN under Clinton, and is a five time Nobel Peace Prize Nominee. 
 
 Secondly, the reason I don't support the candidates that you do as because 1) I disagree with them, 2) they are a sack of uber-religions nut-jobs who are, frankly, a threat to my family.
 
 Having a different background, viewpoint, or opinion than you does not mean it is one that is not thought out. Are you seriously that arrogant and lacking in imagination?
 
 Third, you are the last one to judge the reasons anyone may select a candidate since you have made it abundantly clear that your main priority for a candidate is that they match your faith-based morals.
